textPlain: I spammed the columns from 1 to 402 (with 400 rows), and i saw some cool patterns. I can see a few nodes of clockwise rotation that converges into a single node from >200 columns that starts makes its way down the screen. Trippy.I made a screen recording of it: https://n0ssc.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/prime-doublespe...
I'm probably an idiot but having the columns at a multiple of 6 is very pleasing
So cool! I'd like to be able to start at any number
Very! I saw the distant galaxies spin.

Thanks! Do you mean you’d like to be able to input any number you like?The numbered values are editable inputs. You can click into them and type in the amount you’d like. If you couldn’t tell they were editable inputs, that’s valuable feedback! I’ll redesign them to make it more obvious that you can do so, and don’t have to just click the +/- buttons.
